title: Bill Announcement – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Education	

Issued on:
April 12, 2019
On Friday, April 12, 2019, the President signed into law:H.R. 276, the “Recognizing Achievement in Classified School Employees Act”, which directs the Secretary of Education to establish the Recognizing Inspiring School Employees (RISE) Award Program recognizing excellence exhibited by classified school employees providing services to students in prekindergarten through high school.
